content.prompt: Which of the following observations best represents a mutualistic relationship?

choices.label: Some bacteria and fungi obtain their nutrients by enzymatically digesting larger organisms.
Chloroplasts in green algae provide sugars for use in cellular metabolism.
Hermit crabs utilize empty sea snail shells to protect themselves from predators.
Flowers produce nectar that bees gather to make honey, and in the process the bees pollinate the flowers.
